title: If the universe stops expanding, will the space-time collapse? - Quora

response.answer_text: The universe will only stop expanding if time ceases to exist. So the only way for the universe to stop expanding into Oblivion would be to go through a balckhoke into the third dimension where time ceases to exist. The same thing happend to us when our universe passed through the 5th dimension the 5th dimension ceased to exist for us.
